question: After playing outside on a cold day, Jaime went inside to wash his hands. Although the water was normal temperature, he noticed that it felt warmer than usual. What would explain this phenomenon?
candidate_answers: (A) His body had more kinetic energy than the water. (B) Heat flowed from a cooler substance to a warmer substance. (C) The water from the faucet had a higher temperature than his skin. (D) The thermal energy in the room was higher than the thermal energy outside.
answer: Heat flowed from a cooler substance to a warmer substance.
label: B
